page.title: 18Mark's Houses
page.content: Most of the{houses}have been built along the main B3139 road - The Causeway which runs between Highbridge and Wells. Newer houses are now being built farther back from the main road The majority of the older houses are made of Wedmore Stone. The newer ones tend to be of brick.One interesting house is the old{Police Station}which ceased to be in 1975. Built in 1932,it is made of brick covered with roughcast. The roof tiles are Tegula semi-circle tiles on Imbrick,a slate with supports to hold on the semi-circles. It is now a detached private dwelling. There are approximately 950 houses in Mark,some are over 250 years old and others are just a month old.Many people have lived here all their lives but there are new families and retired people moving into the area.
